short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetches and categorizes colors from the current webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ColorWizz

Effortlessly extract and analyze the color scheme from any webpage. With Color Scheme Fetcher, you can quickly identify and categorize the primary and secondary colors used on a website, making it a perfect tool for designers, developers, and anyone interested in understanding the visual aesthetics of web pages.

Features:

-> Automatically detect and extract colors from the active tab
-> Provide usage frequency of each colors
-> Display color details directly in a convenient popup
-> Simple and intuitive interface

Whether you're designing a new website, looking for color inspiration, or simply curious about the color composition of your favorite sites, ColorWizz provides a quick and easy way to get the color information you need.
